trustfund: TF037255-VENEZUELA - SOCIAL DEVELOPMENT PROJECT,TF037253-VENEZUELA - SOCIAL DEVELOPMENT PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the project is to
            assist the government in developing a social sector strategy
            to redirect its social expenditures into well-targeted and
            efficient programs, by financing high priority activities,
            within the framework of its Social Sectors Action Program.
            The project supports: (a) rehabilitation and development of
            the primary health care network, including provision of
            basic health and nutrition services for pregnant and nursing
            women and children under six years of age; (b) development
            and expansion of pre-school education, focused on the
            lower-income urban and rural areas; (c) information,
            education and communications services for health, nutrition,
            and education promotion; and (d) improvement of the
            government's capacity to design, plan and implement
            social programs and to monitor the effect of such programs.
